item.description:
Meet other local Hand-Drummers who are interested creating community through the rich history of Africa and it's people. Drum Circles are a great way to stay connected to our inner rhythms. You'll learn some new rhythms, get some technique help and meet some great people!

For this meetup, you will need to bring a folding chair as we will be out at the Banks of The River Charles. If RAIN, we will meet inside at The DrumRoom 50 Tufts Steet, Arlington, MA Please call 781-316-8068 before heading out to drum.

1PM to 3PM, bring some water and a light jacket. The weather should be fantastic! 64-68 and SUNNY! (Don't miss this one)

If you are lost on the day of the event, you may call my cell at 617.686.6080 WRITE IT DOWN! Pop it in your phone:)

Feedback from this Summer...

"Had a wonderful time.... The circle was very welcoming and Alan is a competent, incredibly talented, patient and friendly leader. I really had a wonderful time and I'm hoping to make it a regular activity and perhaps bring a friend. ‚Äù Irene
item.how_to_find_us: I'll welcome you into the circle. Many of you know me:)
item.name: Cambridge Drum Circle this Saturday in the Sunshine:)
